data.title: Buffalo Soldiers of the Arizona Territory
data.meta_description: Buffalo Soldiers AZ Territory Monument, 1866 - 1902Arizona State Capitol, Wesley Bolin Memorial Plaza downtown Phoenix, ArizonaWebsite:...
data.text:
Buffalo Soldiers AZ Territory Monument, 1866 - 1902

Arizona State Capitol, Wesley Bolin Memorial Plaza downtown Phoenix, Arizona

Website: https://www.buffalosoldiersazterritorymonument.com

Greetings Donors and Sponsors,

To donors and sponsors your donations over the past years have made a huge difference to the Buffalo Soldiers AZ Territory Monument fundraising, and we are more than grateful to have people like you on our team. THANK YOU, for your continued donations. For those who are just coming aboard thank you for being on our team.

Tax Credit Program

Yes, I am joining with you as a Donor or Sponsor to erect the Buffalo Soldiers AZ Territory Monument. I want to help preserve the proud history of the Buffalo Soldiers, 9th and 10th and 24th and 25th Infantry, 1866 - 1902 legacy and its heritage preserving our freedom.

Up to $400 for individuals and $800 for couples filing jointly. Any amount is appreciated. You will receive an acknowledgement receipt of deducible donation for your records.

Sponsorship

(All Sponsors will have their names included on a permanent plaque on the memorial wall at Arizona State Capitol complex, Wesley Bolin Memorial Plaza Downtown Phoenix, Arizona. Your organization's name and logo displayed on all event materials, including invitations, e-blasts, electronic advertisements, monument website, event programs and press releases)

1. Medal of Honor Sponsor $25,000 4. Bronze Star Sponsor $10,000

2. Valor Sponsor $20,000 5. Buffalo Soldier $5,000

3. Silver Star Sponsor $15,000 6. Meritorious Service Sponsor $2,500

Veterans Organizations, Non-Profit 501(c)(3) and Individuals

(Your organization's name and logo displayed on all event materials, including invitations, e-blasts, electronic, advertisement, monument website, event programs and press releases)

1. Eagle Sponsor $1,000

2. Honor Sponsor $500

3. Supporting Sponsor $250

Donor

Any amount appreciated $ ___________

$25 $50 $75 $100

Heritage and Cultural

The Buffalo Soldiers were African American Soldiers who served on the Western Frontier following the American Civil War.

"Let them proudly sit equally among the heroes who helped defend, build, and settle our great nation. Respecting the Past, Responding to the Present and Reaching to the Future".

American's Historical Cultural that explore stories and beliefs in order to deepen our understanding of the colored soldier's history in 1866 - 1902. They served in the 9th and 10th Cavalry and 24th and 25th Infantry with courage and valor.

We are under tremendous pressure to raise the full $650,000 that is needed for the monument to be enable moving the project to completion. Only with your generous donation, this will become a reality that will proudly reflect an important part of American military history for generations to come.

Thank You! for your kind donation to the Buffalo Soldiers AZ Territory Monument that will be placed at Arizona State Capitol, Wesley Bolin Memorial Plaza downtown Phoenix, Arizona.

Your donation will be used to assist in the historical monument to be erected and 100% of your donation will be used in our mission.

Make check payable to: Buffalo Soldiers AZ Territory Monument, P.O. Box 20883, Mesa, Arizona 85277-0883

Please donate online to A Community thrives- https://www.mightycasue.com/donate/Buffalo-Soldiers-Of-The-Arizona-Territory

Sincerely,

Commander Fred Marable and Deputy Commander Michelle London-Marable, founders of the Official Arizona Centennial Legacy Buffalo Soldiers of the Arizona Territory - Ladies and Gentlemen of the Regiment, Headquarters Mesa, Arizona.

Purpose and mission is "Keeping History Alive" by educating people about the significant contributions of the Buffalo Soldiers legacy. Founded: December 3, 2007.

Monument Project Fundraising Committee
